title: Algebraic form
text: To express the relationship in this form, we need to be able to write the relationship where $$p$$ is a fucntion of $$n$$, which means wirting it as $$p$$ $$=$$ [expression involving n].

title: Subtraction
text: Subtract $$2n$$ from both sides, and we get $$6p=12-2n$$.

title: Division
text: Divide both sides by $$6$$, and we get $$p=\frac{12-2n}{6}$$.

title: Simplification
text: Simplify the expression. What do you get?
